example.caption: Whatever other logging you have, these two lines are required for Pacemaker clusters

section.title: Checking Pacemaker
section.para: Now that we have confirmed that Corosync is functional we can check the rest of the stack.

figure.title: Expected Pacemaker startup logging for Corosync

screen.computeroutput: Aug 27 16:53:15 test1 openais[2166]: [pcmk ] info: pcmk_plugin_init: CRM: Initialized Aug 27 16:53:15 test1 openais[2166]: [pcmk ] Logging: Initialized pcmk_plugin_init Aug 27 16:53:15 test1 openais[2166]: [pcmk ] info: pcmk_plugin_init: Service: 9 Aug 27 16:53:15 test1 openais[2166]: [pcmk ] info: pcmk_plugin_init: Local hostname: test1

figure.caption: If you don't see these messages, or some like them, there is likely a problem finding or loading the pacemaker plugin.
